title: TSMC Founder Morris Chang Makes First Public Appearance In A Year , Meets Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang For Dinner In Taipei - NVIDIA ( NASDAQ : NVDA ), Taiwan Semiconductor ( NYSE : TSM )
description: TSMC founder Morris Chang ended a year-long public absence with a private Taipei dinner alongside Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang, reassuring the semiconductor industry of his sharpness and underscoring TSMC's continued central role as global chip capacity expands worldwide., Web site created using create-react-app
